pkgmetadata.longdescription: Analysis of Multivariate Event Times // Implementation of various statistical models for multivariate event history data doi:10.1007/s10985-013-9244-x. Including multivariate cumulative incidence models doi:10.1002/sim.6016, and bivariate random effects probit models (Liability models) doi:10.1016/j.csda.2015.01.014. Modern methods for survival analysis, including regression modelling (Cox, Fine-Gray, Ghosh-Lin, Binomial regression) with fast computation of influence functions.
